lib/hope/concurrency/spsc_queue.h

00008 
00009 // The implementation is based on:
00010 // http://www.1024cores.net/home/lock-free-algorithms/queues/unbounded-spsc-queue
00011 // http://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/single-producer-single-consumer-queue)
00012 
00013 #pragma once
00014 
00015 #include "hope/concurrency/lcsr.h"
00016 
00017 namespace hope::concurrency {
00018 
00019     template<typename T>
00020     class spsc_queue final {
00021     public:
00022 
00023         spsc_queue(spsc_queue const&) = delete;
00024         spsc_queue& operator = (spsc_queue const&) = delete;
00025 
00026         spsc_queue(spsc_queue&& queue) = default;
00027         spsc_queue& operator=(spsc_queue&& queue) = default;
00028 
00029         explicit spsc_queue(std::size_t pre_alloc = 0) {
00030             node* n = new node;
00031             m_tail = m_head = m_first = m_m_tail_copy = n;
00032 
00033             // TODO:: rework
00034             T dummy;
00035             for (std::size_t i = 0; i != pre_alloc; ++i)
00036                 enqueue(dummy);
00037 
00038             for (std::size_t i = 0; i != pre_alloc; ++i)
00039                 try_dequeue(dummy);
00040         }
00041 
00042         ~spsc_queue() {
00043             for(auto* cur_node = m_first; cur_node != nullptr;) {
00044                 auto* next = cur_node->next;
00045                 delete cur_node;
00046                 cur_node = next;
00047             }
00048         }
00049 
00050         template<typename... Args>
00051         void enqueue(Args&&... v)
00052         {
00053             auto* n = alloc_node(std::forward<Args>(v)...);
00054             n->next = nullptr;
00055             store_release(&m_head->next, n);
00056             m_head = n;
00057         }
00058 
00059         bool try_dequeue(T& v) {
00060             if (load_consume(&m_tail->next))
00061             {
00062                 v = m_tail->next->value;
00063                 store_release(&m_tail, m_tail->next);
00064                 return true;
00065             }
00066 
00067             return false;
00068         }
00069 
00070     private:
00071         // internal node structure 
00072         struct node final {
00073             template<typename... Args>
00074             node(Args&&... args)
00075                 : value(std::forward<Args>(args)...) { }
00076 
00077             node* next = nullptr;
00078             T value;
00079         };
00080 
00081         // consumer part 
00082         // accessed mainly by consumer, infrequently be producer 
00083         node* m_tail = nullptr; // tail of the queue 
00084 
00085         // cache line size on modern x86 processors (in bytes) 
00086         constexpr static std::size_t  CacheLineSize = 64;
00087 
00088         // delimiter between consumer part and producer part
00089         // is needed to put this parts to the different cache lines
00090         const uint8_t m_cache_line_pad_[CacheLineSize]{};
00091 
00092         // producer part 
00093         // accessed only by producer 
00094         node* m_head = nullptr; // head of the queue 
00095         node* m_first = nullptr; // last unused node (tail of node cache) 
00096         node* m_m_tail_copy = nullptr; // helper (points somewhere between m_first and m_tail) 
00097 
00098         template<typename... Args>
00099         node* create_from_internal(Args&&... args) {
00100             node* n = m_first;
00101             m_first = m_first->next;
00102             n->value = T(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
00103             return n;
00104         }
00105 
00106         template<typename... Args>
00107         node* alloc_node(Args&&... args) {
00108             // first tries to allocate node from internal node cache, 
00109             // if attempt fails, allocates node via ::operator new() 
00110 
00111             if (m_first != m_m_tail_copy)
00112                 return create_from_internal(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
00113 
00114             m_m_tail_copy = load_consume(&m_tail);
00115 
00116             if (m_first != m_m_tail_copy)
00117                 return create_from_internal(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
00118 
00119             return new node(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
00120         }
00121     };
00122 
00123 }
